name: Duel Royale
description: The First Telegram-Based and GameFi Battle Royale Bot. Welcome to Duel Royale, the Telegram bot that brings non-stop excitement straight to your fingertips! Inspired by Rumble Royale, Duel Royale is the first Telegram-based and GameFi Battle Royale bot, which let users play an exciting text-based game on Telegram and win cash prizes. There's no need to wait - jump into thrilling battles against other players or challenge our fighter bots for instant action. But here's where it gets even more thrilling: you can win money through the Duel Royale gambling twist! Leveraging our proprietary $ROYALE ERC-20 token, you can amp up the intensity of the games by placing bets on your battles, making every showdown even more exhilarating. So round up your friends, dive into the action, and let the games begin!
